subtitle.hide: Yuoai.com We attach great importance to the protection of users' privacy and personal information. When you use the website, we will not collect any of your personal information.However, when you use our password box service, we will ask for part of your personal information. The information is provided voluntarily or not, which does not affect the use of the password box.

text.about:

Yuoai.com For you!
text.hide: When using the password box, we will collect your following information:

explain.name: When the system sends a message, it is used to address you.
explain.age: It is used to deal with minors' downloading and browsing information.
explain.passwordKey: Encrypt your password to prevent the server from being attacked and revealing your password.
